column4: How can I recreate the fstab-file AUTOMATICly?  I removed a CDROM und install a Harddisk, but gparted dont start because there are wrong lines in fstab...  :(
there is no way to automatically generate it, it has to be done manually
OK, that not a good answer for me... :(   :(
that is the only answer, you will need to fix your fstab manually
